title: Magic Slippers: A Villainy Consultant Novella
description: Discover a wickedly funny fantasy that The Princess Bride meets Once Upon a Time. Perfect for fans of fractured fairy tales!Geoffrey P. Ward’s Rule for Success #1: Never fall in love with heroines.Ella is the most beautiful, kind, loving, and incredible person Dove Reynolds has ever known. For years, he has watched her from afar, hoping for a chance to win her heart, but what chance does a lowly undergardener have in winning such a girl? But when he overhears Ella wishing to go to the Royal Ball, Dove sees his opportunity to sweep her off her feet, if he can only find a way to get her there…Magic Slippers is a blending of all the classic Cinderella stories with a healthy dose of cynicism and snark that shows that not all happily ever afters end the way we expect.Though part of the Villainy Consultant Series, this is the standalone novella and can be read on its own.Buy your copy today and leap into a new fantasy world where not all magic is good and not all endings are happily ever after.
author: M.A. Nichols
